alert.note: Alert for Bradley; McMinn; Monroe; Polk (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 03 at 1:33PM CST until March 03 at 2:30PM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Bradley County in east Tennessee... Polk County in east Tennessee... McMinn County in east Tennessee... Southwestern Monroe County in east Tennessee... * Until 330 PM EST. * At 233 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Athens, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Athens, Madisonville, Benton, Ducktown, Etowah, Charleston, South Cleveland, East Cleveland and Wildwood Lake. This includes Interstate 75 in Tennessee between mile markers 24 and 53. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM EST for southwestern North Carolina...and east Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
